item.title: Request for Tree Planting, 3rd October
item.description:
I request for a tree to be planted on the mini roundabout in the middle of the road of the mead. It would greatly enhance the ambience of that part of the mead (where I reside) as currently it is a favourite for car Parking. Thank You
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Mead, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaf clearance and drain unblocking, 3rd October
item.description:
I refer to my previous report ref no 8243731.I have been advised that this had been ‘ Fixesd ‘. It has not been fixed . I am currently looking at the roads in question and nothing has cleared. Please reinstate the request and act on it as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 181, The Green, Upper Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crab tree mess with crab apples all over pavement o/s 56 Lyndhurst road has not been fixed. still in a mess all over pavement and grass verge., 3rd October
item.description:
Please can someone sort out the crab tree o/s 56 Lyndhurst road. Mess on pavement . Grass cutting was left messy and man with blower continued to blow apples , grass all over the place and left mess. made it worse not done properly. Crab tree needs to be crowned on the top and sorted as very messy and dangerous on the pavement for people trying to walk by without slipping. Problem occurs every year. Needs sorting out please.....
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lyndhurst Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fridge/freezer blocking half of pavement, 3rd October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 136, Herbert Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet
